description:
Kotone is a 16-year-old girl from the countryside. She travels to Dali, the capital city of the kingdom of Actus, to find a place to live where she can start a new life.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: RPG Fudousan e Youkoso! Hajimete no Oheya Sagashi Desu!
RPG不動産へようこそ! はじめてのお部屋探しです!
Welcome to RPG Real Estate! Room-Searching for the First Time!
